eu_initiatives: SRIW is not yet involved (directly or indirectly) in initiatives, policies or legal issues covered by the European Commission. In the frame of the so-called NEXT Programme created by Wallonia (Belgium), we finance  Circular Economy industrial projects (loans and capital).  Therefore, SRIW applied (and was selected) to the European Commission call "Circular Economy Financing Expert Group".

goals__remit:
SRIW is a public investment company of Wallonia. It supports business growth, from start-ups to large companies, with tailored financing solutions (capital, subordinated loans) and guarantees. 
SRIW is a public limited company subject to company law and governed by the Law of 2 April 1962 on Federal Investment Companies and Regional Investment Companies.
relevant_communication: We do not organize events and have no publication, to the exception of our annual report.
